GS40rascum_u:3100: tataḥ śulbasya tīkṣṇasya kāntasya rajatasya ca /
GS40rascum_u:3101: suvarṇasya ca bījāni vidhāya parijārayet // Rcūm_16.85 //
GS40rascum_u:3106: śatadhā daradavyūḍhaṃ tāmraṃ hi triguṇaṃ rase // Rcūm_16.87 //
GS40rascum_u:3111: kuryādbhīmasamaṃ martyaṃ mukte ca bhuji vikramam // Rcūm_16.89 //
GS40rascum_u:3116: karoti martyaṃ gatamṛtyubhītiṃ mahābalaṃ dhvastarujaṃ suputram //
GS40rascum_u:3120: kāntajīrṇarasaś caivaṃ guṇaiḥ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet // Rcūm_16.92 //
GS40rascum_u:3121: dviguṇajaritakānto vyādhibādhāṃ hinasti harati ca rasa uccairvyādhivakraṃ kṣaṇena /
GS40rascum_u:3122: valipalitavikāraṃ duḥkhadāridryamṛtyuṃ janayati varaputraṃ saccaritraṃ rasendraḥ // Rcūm_16.93
GS40rascum_u:3128: {viḍa:: for jāraṇa of mercury with gold}
GS40rascum_u:3133: bahuvidhagadamuktaṃ hanti vārdhakyamuccaiḥ vṛkajaṭharadṛḍhāśauddāmam agniṃ ca kuryāt // Rcūm_16.97
GS40rascum_u:3135: vinihanti na sandehaḥ kuryācchatadhanaṃ naram // Rcūm_16.98 //
